<title level="1" right="Focus 2" pfs="Standard">
[Light of Revelation](/Spells.aspx?ID=557)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Revelation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=138" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 91 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You shed a luminous aura, illuminating a 30-foot radius with bright light. You and all allies in this area gain a +1 status bonus to Perception checks to detect hidden or undetected creatures, as well as hidden objects, doors, and other features.
name: Light of Revelation
